text: Tharowangka: A so Allah i taralbi a Mata-o ko kiyathai a kiyapakatarug iran: Ruk Iyan so mapagu-uma ko manga Langit a go so Lopa: Sayana a lambas i Kailai Sukaniyan, go sayana a Malambut i Kapamamakinug! Da-a bagiyan niran a salakao Rukaniyan a Panarigan; go da-a phakasakoto Niyan ko Kokoman Niyan a isa bo
